Sentencas: Detailed thermodynamic, kinetic, geometric, and cost models are developed, implemented, and validated for the synthesis/design and operational analysis of hybrid solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC)-gas turbine-steam turbine systems ranging in size from 1.5 MWe to 10 MWe.
Titulo: Thermoeconomic Modeling and Parametric Study of Hybrid Solid Oxide Fuel Cell-Gas Turbine-Steam Turbine Power Plants Ranging From 1.5 MWe to 10 MWe

Sentencas: The fuel cell model used in this research work is based on a tubular Siemens-Westinghouse-type SOFC, which is integrated with a gas turbine and a heat recovery steam generator (HRSG) integrated in turn with a steam turbine cycle.
Titulo: Thermoeconomic Modeling and Parametric Study of Hybrid Solid Oxide Fuel Cell-Gas Turbine-Steam Turbine Power Plants Ranging From 1.5 MWe to 10 MWe

Sentencas: The current work considers the possible benefits of using the exhaust gases in a HRSG in order to produce steam, which drives a steam turbine for additional power output.
Titulo: Thermoeconomic Modeling and Parametric Study of Hybrid Solid Oxide Fuel Cell-Gas Turbine-Steam Turbine Power Plants Ranging From 1.5 MWe to 10 MWe

Sentencas: Four different steam turbine cycles are considered in this research work: a single-pressure, a dual-pressure, a triple-pressure, and a triple-pressure with reheat.
Titulo: Thermoeconomic Modeling and Parametric Study of Hybrid Solid Oxide Fuel Cell-Gas Turbine-Steam Turbine Power Plants Ranging From 1.5 MWe to 10 MWe

Sentencas: The models have been developed to function both at design (full load) and off-design (partial load) conditions.
Titulo: Thermoeconomic Modeling and Parametric Study of Hybrid Solid Oxide Fuel Cell-Gas Turbine-Steam Turbine Power Plants Ranging From 1.5 MWe to 10 MWe

Sentencas: In addition, different solid oxide fuel cell sizes are examined to assure a proper selection of SOFC size based on efficiency or cost.
Titulo: Thermoeconomic Modeling and Parametric Study of Hybrid Solid Oxide Fuel Cell-Gas Turbine-Steam Turbine Power Plants Ranging From 1.5 MWe to 10 MWe

Sentencas: The thermoeconomic analysis includes cost functions developed specifically for the different system and component sizes (capacities) analyzed.
Titulo: Thermoeconomic Modeling and Parametric Study of Hybrid Solid Oxide Fuel Cell-Gas Turbine-Steam Turbine Power Plants Ranging From 1.5 MWe to 10 MWe

Sentencas: A parametric study is used to determine the most viable system/component syntheses/designs based on maximizing the total system efficiency or minimizing the total system life cycle cost.
Titulo: Thermoeconomic Modeling and Parametric Study of Hybrid Solid Oxide Fuel Cell-Gas Turbine-Steam Turbine Power Plants Ranging From 1.5 MWe to 10 MWe
